content:
# The Stone Furnace is still reporting "NO_FUEL" and has warnings indicating that it is "out of fuel" and has "no ingredients to smelt." 
# Currently, it has produced 5 Copper Plates, but it cannot continue processing due to insufficient fuel.

# The furnace has 5 units of coal remaining, which should be enough for further smelting, but it appears that the furnace is not consuming the coal properly or there may be a misconfiguration.

# To resolve this, I will insert additional coal into the furnace to ensure it has enough fuel to smelt the remaining Copper Ore. 
# I will insert 3 more units of coal to ensure the furnace is adequately fueled.

insert_item(Prototype.Coal, target=stone_furnace_entity, quantity=3)  # Inserting 3 units of coal into the furnace.

# After refueling, I will check the status and inventory of the furnace again to confirm it is operational.
print(f"Inventory after refueling: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Output current inventory.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Checking the state of entities after the action.
